snippet.title: Moses & Plato - Last Train to Clawville | Demo Coming on May 9th, 2024!
snippet.description:
DEMO COMING TO STEAM ON MAY 9TH, 2024!

Moses & Plato - Last Train to Clawville is a murder mystery in which you are the main suspect! An ambassador on a peace mission has been killed on board the Clawville Express. Time progresses as you sniff out clues, eavesdrop on conversations, and interrogate passengers. Can you solve the case before the train reaches the last station?

Play the demo and wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2230450/Moses__Plato__Last_Train_to_Clawville/

Developer: The Wild Gentlemen
Publisher: Toge Productions

= Music Credit =
Title: Call to Adventure
Music: Kevin MacLeod
License: CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/)
Download: https://incompetech.com/music/
Changes: minor changes have been made in editing and mastering. 
ISRC: USUAN1300022
© 2013 Kevin MacLeod
